item.description:
Group's first outdoor event! Fresh air, green enironment, meet & make friends, light workout. How can you say no to all these! Bring your own food and drinks. Feel free to bring extra to share :-) Let me know if you need a ride. I am meeting two members at Alewife T-Station.

http://www.nps.gov/mi...

Direction: From I-95: Take exit 30B. You will be on Route 2A west. The park is 1-mile west off ramp. We will meet inside the Visitors Center at 11am EDT.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Picnic & Hike @ Minuteman Park in Lexington
